lines.text: Well, if it isn't my old friend, Beau Brummell Millhouse. Where did you get that or-chid?
That's a night-blooming cryptogram - far rarer than any orchid.
(The "orchid" squirts water all over Hank) Introducing my new sideline of tricks, jokes and novelties. Buy some?
Here it is. Lights like a perfecto, goes off like a torpedo and it's only two bits!
[Gene and Frog enter a bar pretending to be murderous outlaws]
I'd like a glass of milk.

[elbows Frog]
Aw, he's always kidding. We'll drink whiskey straight and wash it down with lye.
